tool_description: Creates and manages standardized templates for different types of knowledge base articles, ensuring consistency in structure and format across all content.

template_type.description: Type of template: FAQ, How-to, Troubleshooting, Policy, or Reference

action.description: Action to perform: create, retrieve, update, or delete

error_messages: Invalid template type: Must be one of FAQ, How-to, Troubleshooting, Policy, or Reference
Invalid action: Must be one of create, retrieve, update, or delete
Template name required: template_name must be provided for create and update actions
Template not found: Specified template does not exist for retrieve, update, or delete actions
usage: Specify template_type and action. For create and update actions, provide template_name. The tool will return appropriate template structures or perform the requested template management action.

template_structure.description: The template content structure with placeholders

required_sections.description: List of mandatory sections for this template type

optional_sections.description: List of optional sections that can be included

action_result.description: Result message of the performed action
